title: Got kicked out of my promotion series after 1 loss
body:
Hi, I'm currently gold 5. I just finished a marathon of games where I managed to climb into my series. Since I recently dropped from gold 4 to gold 5, I automatically had 1 win in my series. I unfortunately lost my first game of the series and expected to see the series at 1-1 but instead got a notification saying I was unsuccessful in completing my series. Is there any way someone can look into this. I was put back into gold 5 with 79 lp. This has never happened before in my 3 years of playing league.

Thanks :)

replies.body: Hey, I looked into this for you and found a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  :(  Queue dodging will result in a loss, followed by a match loss which ended the series.  You're still pretty high in LP, so you can still make it back into your series quickly hopefully.  Good luck!
Ahhh, thank you so much. That makes so much more sense. Thanks again I appreciate the clarification.
